description.narrative: Central level activities, which contributes to Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas, Technical Excellence In Policy And Programmes. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: (intersectorial salaries, zonal offices, supply/log and IT, intersectorial Communication for Development (C4D) and external communication)
